name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Backend Developer with 8 years of experience, I excel in creating high-performance backend solutions utilizing **Kotlin**, **Spring Boot**, and **RESTful APIs** within an agile environment. My technical expertise extends to working with relational databases and **NoSQL databases**, ensuring data integrity and optimization. I am proficient in **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP** cloud services, along with containerization technologies like **Docker** and **Kubernetes**. I have a solid foundation in **continuous integration** and **continuous deployment** (CI/CD) best practices, actively contributing to the delivery of reliable and scalable applications.
In addition to my backend skills, I possess strong problem-solving abilities, attention to detail, and effective communication skills. My experience with **frontend build tools** and **testing frameworks** complements my backend capabilities, allowing for seamless integration and maintenance of solutions across healthcare and financial sectors. I am committed to aligning applications with compliance standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2.
